review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick is used on my Vizio Smart TV. The TV too has a Prime application and it works far better than the Amazon stick. Both the TV and Stick are connected to my home WIFI and the reception and streaming is far better in the TV whereas the Stick very often disconnects from the network and frequently stops for buffering. Both these devices are at the same distance from my WiFi modem and I don’t understand why the Stick cant stream as efficiently as the TV. It is very annoying to see ‘No Network’ message from the stick.In short, I am very disappointed with the Fire TV Stick's performance and capability.
